SELECT C.CID CID,C.CNAME CNAME,C.CSELECTED CSELECTED,C.REQUIRE REQ,C.TASK TASK,IFNULL(B.SNAME, '-') SNAME, B.SID SID FROM (SELECT T.* FROM GP_TITLE T) C LEFT JOIN (SELECT S.SID, S.CID, S.SNAME FROM GP_STUDENTS S) B ON C.CID = B.CID
AND T.CNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%')

SELECT C.CID CID,C.CNAME CNAME,C.CSELECTED CSELECTED,C.REQUIRE REQ,C.TASK TASK,IFNULL(B.SNAME, '-') SNAME, B.SID SID, C.TNAME TNAME, C.TID TID, C.ID TID FROM (SELECT T.*, X.TNAME, X.TID ID FROM GP_TITLE T JOIN GP_TEACHER X ON T.TID = X.TID) C LEFT JOIN (SELECT S.SID, S.CID, S.SNAME FROM GP_STUDENTS S) B ON C.CID = B.CID
AND T.CNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GP_TITLE T WHERE T.CID = #{cid} AND T.CSELECTED = '否'
